14
15#ifndef BIND9_GETADDRESSES_H
16#define BIND9_GETADDRESSES_H 1
17
18/*! \file bind9/getaddresses.h */
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21#include <isc/types.h>
22
23#include <isc/net.h>
24
25ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
26
27isc_result_t
28bind9_getaddresses(const char *hostname, in_port_t port,
29 isc_sockaddr_t *addrs, int addrsize, int *addrcount);
30/*%<
31 * Use the system resolver to get the addresses associated with a hostname.
32 * If successful, the number of addresses found is returned in 'addrcount'.
33 * If a hostname lookup is performed and addresses of an unknown family is
34 * seen, it is ignored. If more than 'addrsize' addresses are seen, the
35 * first 'addrsize' are returned and the remainder silently truncated.
36 *
37 * This routine may block. If called by a program using the isc_app
38 * framework, it should be surrounded by isc_app_block()/isc_app_unblock().
39 *
40 * Requires:
41 *\li 'hostname' is not NULL.
42 *\li 'addrs' is not NULL.
43 *\li 'addrsize' > 0
44 *\li 'addrcount' is not NULL.
45 *
46 *
47 * Returns:
48 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS
49 *\li #ISC_R_NOTFOUND
50 *\li #ISC_R_FAMILYNOSUPPORT - 'hostname' is an IPv6 address, and IPv6 is
51 * not supported.
52 */
53
54ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
55
56#endif /* BIND9_GETADDRESSES_H */
57
